# Copilot Instructions for DonDisco

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a Vite + React + TypeScript project with Material UI called "DonDisco". 

## Technology Stack
- **Framework**: React 18 with TypeScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **UI Library**: Material UI (@mui/material) with Emotion
- **Icons**: Material UI Icons (@mui/icons-material)

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with TypeScript
- Follow Material UI design patterns and theming
- Use proper TypeScript types for all components and functions
- Implement responsive design using Material UI's Grid and responsive utilities
- Use Material UI's theming system for consistent styling
- Follow React best practices with hooks and proper state management

## File Structure
- `/src` - Main source code
- `/src/components` - Reusable React components
- `/src/pages` - Page components
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
- `/src/theme` - Material UI theme configuration
- `/public` - Static assets

## Code Style
- Use arrow functions for components
- Use descriptive variable and function names
- Include proper TypeScript interfaces and types
- Use Material UI components over custom CSS when possible
- Follow the existing project structure and naming conventions
